newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle off $0.50-$1 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle off $0.50-$1 - USDA.

text.p: Live Sales Slaughter steers and heifers were $0.50-$1.00 per cwt lower, compared to last test on Thursday, USDA said.
Trade fairly slow. Demand light. Seller interest light to moderate. Offerings current.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1175-1275 lbs few 63.00-64.00 few Choice to 65.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1050-1200 lbs few 63.00-64.00 few Choice to 65.00.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to Monday's close - Slaughter steers and heifers steady in light test.

Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1250 lbs pt ld 103.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs few 99.00-100.00 Holsteins - ( grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales Select 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1075-1175 lbs few 102.50-103.00.
Wk to Date - 3,400 Week Ago - 36,700 Year Ago - 9,800
